statements: SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT outcome, patient_id FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE treatment_id = 2
SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE policy_id = 3
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id, outcome FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE patient_id = 4
SELECT policy_id, outcome FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE treatment_id = 5
SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE policy_id = 1 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, outcome FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE outcome LIKE 'Improved%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS TotalPatients, AVG(treatment_id) AS AvgTreatment FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE treatment_id > 100 GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT patient_id, outcome FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE policy_id = 2 AND outcome LIKE '%Poor%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(treatment_id) AS MaxTreatment, MIN(treatment_id) AS MinTreatment FROM PatientOutcomes;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, policy_implemented FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE Patients.age >= 40;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT patient_name, gender, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE Patients.age < 40;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, treatment_name, effectiveness_rating FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age > 18;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patient ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatment WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, outcome FROM Patient JOIN Outcome ON Patient.patient_id = Outcome.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_duration, cost FROM Treatment WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_name, o.outcome FROM Patient p JOIN Outcome o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id JOIN Treatment t ON o.treatment_id = t.treatment_id ORDER BY p.patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id, policy_id, outcome_result FROM Outcomes ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name, Treatments.cost FROM Patients JOIN Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Outcomes.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Outcomes.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name, Policies.policy_name FROM Patients JOIN Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Outcomes.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Outcomes.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id LEFT JOIN Policies ON Outcomes.policy_id = Policies.policy_id;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, outcome_result FROM Patients JOIN Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Outcomes.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Outcomes.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE Treatments.cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, condition FROM Patients WHERE condition = 'Fever';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT description FROM Policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%insurance%';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, age, condition FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM Patients;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, description, outcome FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.treatment_id JOIN Treatment_Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Treatment_Outcomes.patient_id WHERE outcome_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT Policies.policy_name, Policies.description, COUNT(Patient_Treatments.treatment_id) AS total_treatments FROM Policies LEFT JOIN Patient_Treatments ON Policies.policy_id = Patient_Treatments.patient_id GROUP BY Policies.policy_name;
